data.title: Will Smith Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Will Smith on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Will Smith including Bad Boys: Ride or Die, Emancipation, and more.
data.text:
The One with Will Smith and Margot Robbie

Jeremy tests the new BMW M4 at the track, while Richard pays tribute to a 4Ã4 that has been in production for 66 years. Meanwhile, James tests the brand new, 500 horsepower Mercedes-AMG GT.

Where the Party At

Gina (Tisha Campbell) plans a surprise party for Martin (Martin Lawrence) and gets a surprise herself.

Jonny Comes Marching Home

Jonny Scott, a recently divorced college friend of Robert, Dirk and Neesee's, comes to town. After seeing Jonny and Neesee kiss, Robert isn't happy to learn that the two of them want to date.

Jonny Come Lately? pt.1

In a special one-hour episode, Robert's best friend and college buddy, Jonny, returns to see Neesee, and the gang heads off to Las Vegas on a road trip.
